==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|ふみ|つき|k2=づき|yomi=k|r=y}}

===Etymology===
[[文]] (ふみ, ''fumi''), "writing" + [[月]] (つき, ''tsuki''), "month"

===Pronunciation===
* {{ja-pron|ふみづき|y=k|acc=2|acc_ref=NHK}}
* {{ja-pron|ふづき|acc=1|acc_ref=NHK}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|ふみづき|ふづき}}

# {{lb|ja|archaic|sort=ふみづき}} the seventh month of the lunar calendar
# {{lb|ja|poetic|sort=ふみづき}} the book month; [[July]]
